message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really like it. I'm asking for $110, but I'm open to negotiation.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $90 is tempting, I'm still hoping to get closer to my original asking price. How about $105? I think this is a fair compromise.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $97.50. I'm willing to pay $97.50 for it.
